--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, Scxoof187 <scxoof187@y...> wrote:
> I down loaded some senerios but i can seem to figure out how to 
play them can some 1 help me plz

Inside your Gladiator/OpenGlad folder, there will be two empty 
folders, 'pix' and 'scen'. When you open the scenario in a zip, unzip 
the .pix files into the 'pix' folder and unzip the .fss files into 
the 'scen' folder. Boot up the game, set the level number to be the 
same as the number of the scenario you want to play, and you should 
end up playing it!
